public class NiceTile extends MapTile
A MapTile with a basic outline and hover-rendering.

1.0
Author:
frank

    • NiceTile

      public NiceTile(MapWorld world, int col, int row)
      Creates a new Tile for the passed world at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      world - The MapWorld to add the tile to
      col - The column this Tile is placed at
      row - The row this Tile is placed at
